fields.headline: Limestone takes a short route
fields.bodyText: Limestone Lad is poised to drop back in distance for next Sunday's AIG Europe Champion Hurdle at Leopardstown. He will be reverting to two miles and is looking for his 36th victory. "He's on the boil and I would like to give him a crack at the race," said Michael Bowe, whose father James bred, owns and trains the 10-year-old. Colonel Braxton forwarded his claims for the Cheltenham Gold Cup with victory in the Listed Normans Grove Chase at Fairyhouse yesterday.
